title: English for dating online
description: We discuss the language used for online dating

vocabItems.definition: brief written description of yourself which you hope will attract a romantic partner
making you believe something that is not true
spending a lot of time with someone, often friends
finding a balance between opposing ideas, or between two sides so as not to annoy either side
trying to attract someone by pretending to be someone else on social media
pretending to share the same political and social opinions as a person that you are attracted to
